attributes.action: Do not exempt people with mental health conditions from receiving pip.
attributes.background: People with mental health conditions should not face discrimination and financial loss in the name of getting people back to work.

rejection.details:
Those with a long-term mental health condition can already get Personal Independence Payment (PIP). You may wish to start another petition about changing the application process. 

More information about PIP eligibility can be found here: https://www.gov.uk/pip/eligibility
